definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart
distance apart/separated by a given distance

sentences.english: It introduces the motion requirement and the structural characters of yawing and variable pitch.
sentences.chinese: 简述了偏航和变桨距系统结构特点和动作要求。

sentences.english: From the Chilean capital of Santiago, the epicenter about 590 km.
sentences.chinese: 震中距智利首都圣地亚哥市约590公里。

sentences.english: The flexible dolly bar can effectively adjust the film space, and perform the accurate orientation.
sentences.chinese: 灵活的调节杆，能快速有效地调整膜距，正确定位。

sentences.english: Cannot change text flow because columns will overflow into margins .
sentences.chinese: 不能改变文字排列，因为栏将溢出到页边距中。

sentences.english: Discussion on ultra-long span optical communication engineering construction;
sentences.chinese: 讨论了超长站距传输系统的各种实现技术。

sentences.english: As of noon on Saturday, the water had risen to within 20 meters of the mine opening.
sentences.chinese: 截至星期六中午，水位已上升到距矿井口约20米处。

sentences.english: There have been no defaults so far, says the company’s founder, Calvin Chin.
sentences.chinese: 距公司创始人陈国权称迄今为止还没有拖欠记录。

sentences.english: Leaf base sessile, rarely sub sessile, spurred.
sentences.chinese: 叶基部无梗，很少近无柄，距。

sentences.english: The polygonal fault is tensional fault system with small throws, which is of nontectonic origin.
sentences.chinese: 多边形断层是一种非构造成因的断距微小的张性断层。

sentences.english: The efficiencies of traps increase with height above the bed.
sentences.chinese: 集沙效率随着距床面高度的增加而急剧增高。

sentences.english: Apex ? 1 reappears to Deltan graviton telemetry 0.6 billion km from Delta.
sentences.chinese: 尖端1号，重新出现在距德尔塔6亿公里的地方。

sentences.english: Your position distance 400metres from intersection of reference line.
sentences.chinese: 你船的位置距参照线交点400米。

sentences.english: In this sense, the decision tree method is less effective than the strategic matrix method.
sentences.chinese: 从这个意义上来说，决策树法不如策略距阵法有效。

sentences.english: The suits come almost three years to the day since the companies were taken over by the federal government.
sentences.chinese: 此次诉讼距联邦政府接管“两房”的日子已接近三年。

sentences.english: Dad passed away about four months after the fly-in.
sentences.chinese: 距那次飞行几个月后，父亲去世了。

sentences.english: Some cattle were grazing off in the distance in spots where the grass was tall and luscious.
sentences.chinese: 一些牛放牧过，在距景点如草，身材性感。

definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
distance apart/separated by a given distance
to be located at/to be situated at/to lie
to be located at/to be situated in
to be right next to/close neighbor
to be right next to/to lean closely against
travel time/expected time for a car journey
